title: Available 8/15 or later: Sunny Modern One BR Cottage with Shared Yard
posting_body: Come home to a tastefully-furnished, sunny one bedroom detached cottage located behind the main house in tree-lined yard.
This central location is off Woodside and Bonita, just far enough that you will still enjoy a quiet, tranquil neighborhood.
Walking distance to Safeway, Target, YMCA, and many restaurants (Walk Score: 84).
About a ten minute bike ride from downtown Redwood City and Cal Train station.
About a 30 minute bike ride to Stanford University.
*Light-filled living room
*Bedroom features new Milgard casement windows overlooking garden beds
*Renovated bathroom with rain shower
*Washer/ dryer in detached basement
*Driveway parking spot is negotiable
Video tour:
https://youtu.be/WC89ovanyjM
Rent is $2600 per month for a year lease.
Available 8/15 or later.
Utilities not included.
Cats are welcome.
A little about us (we live in the main house):
My husband and I are lucky to be able to work from home and our girls (eight and ten) attend school nearby.
We're a car-less family that loves travels to travel the world.
Our only pets right now are two bunnies.
We look forward to possibly having you as our neighbor!
